verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Healing rain is falling down Healing rain is falling down (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Healing rain is falling down Healing rain is falling down I’m not afraid I’m not afraid (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your grace has found me just as I am Empty handed but alive in Your hands We’re singing Majesty We’re singing Majesty{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Forever I am changed by Your love In the presence of your Majesty{/lang-eng}
